name: TwoFortyPowerConverter
0:
”Alexa, two forty power converter”
”Alexa, ask two forty power converter to give me five hundred watts in amps”
”Alexa, ask two forty power converter to compute how many watts is forty amps”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: two forty power converter
des: We had so much success with one twenty power converter that making this application was was a blatant necessity. While most house appliances are 120 volts in the US and Canada, many large appliance like dryers, air conditioners, and stoves use 240 volts. Now you can convert with the magic of Alexa amperage values to wattage as well as wattage to amperage.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
